data.comment: Text for Area of Law

data.comment: The title of the Assign Team Permission field on the Settings page

data.name: Cancel_Button_Text
data.comment: Value to be displayed on Cancel button

data.name: Default_Values_Section_Description
data.value: Default selections will be editable when a new matter is created.
data.comment: Default values section description

data.name: Default_Values_Section_Title
data.comment: Select default values section text

data.name: Include_Calendar_Default_Title
data.comment: The title of the Include Calendar field on the Settings page

data.name: Include_Email_Notification_Default_Title
data.comment: The title of the Include email notification field on the Settings page

data.name: Include_RSS_Feeds_Default_Title
data.comment: The title of the Include RSS Feeds field on the Settings page

data.name: Matter_Center_Portal_Link
data.comment: Matter Center Portal link

data.name: Matter_Conflict_Check_Description
data.value: Selecting No will remove the conflict check declaration fields from new matters
data.comment: The description of the Matter Conflict Check field on the Setting page

data.name: Matter_Conflict_Check_Title
data.value: Do matters need conflict check data?
data.comment: The title of the Matter Conflict Check field on the Settings page

data.name: Matter_Description_Field_Description
data.value: Selecting No will allow new matters to be saved without a description
data.comment: The description of the Matter Description field on the Settings page

data.name: Matter_Description_Required_Title
data.value: Make the matter description field required?
data.comment: The title of the Matter Description Required field on the Settings page

data.name: Matter_Id_Default_Description
data.value: ID numbers must be manually entered when a new matter is created. Enter default text, such as ID prefix or suffix, or numbering instructions. This text can be removed or changed when a new matter is created.
data.comment: The description to be displayed for the Matter ID field

data.name: Matter_Id_Default_Title
data.comment: The title of the Matter Id field on the Settings page

data.name: Matter_Name_Default_Description
data.value: Enter default text to appear when a new matter is created. For example, a matter name prefix or suffix, or naming convention instructions.This text can be removed or changed when a new matter is created.
data.comment: The description to be displayed for the Matter Name field

data.name: Matter_Name_Default_Title
data.comment: The title of the Matter Name field on the Settings page

data.name: Matter_Type_Default_Info
data.value: Selection complete? Hide matter type section
data.comment: The information to be displayed for the Matter Type field

data.name: Matter_Type_Default_Title
data.value: Set a default matter type by selecting a Practice group, Area of law, and Sub areas of law below.
data.comment: The title of the Matter Type field on the Settings page

data.name: Name_Column_Text
data.comment: Assign permission name column text

data.name: Page_Default_Description
data.value: This page shows the current settings for this client’s new matters. The first section allows you to set new matter default selections, which can be changed when a matter is created. The second section defines settings that can not be changed when a new matter is created. No changes are required, and any changes made will not affect existing matters.
data.comment: The description to be displayed on the Settings page

data.name: Permission_Column_Text
data.comment: Assign permission column text

data.name: Restricted_Access_Default_Title
data.value: Default to restricting access to an assigned team?
data.comment: The title of the Restricted Access field on the Settings page

data.name: Restricted_Access_Description
data.value: This can be changed when a new matter is created. If you select yes, you can either define a default team below or leave the team permission blank.
data.comment: Description of restricted access field on Settings page

data.name: Role_Column_Text
data.comment: Assign permission role column text

data.name: Save_Button_Text
data.comment: Value to be displayed on Save button

data.name: Selected_Default_Matter_Text
data.comment: Selected default matter type text

data.name: Select_Practice_Group
data.comment: Text for Select a practice group

data.name: Set_Matter_Options_Default_Description
data.value: These settings will not be editable when a new matter is created.
data.comment: The description of the Set Matter options section on the Settings page

data.name: Set_Matter_Options_Default_Title
data.comment: The title of the Set Matter options section on the Settings page

data.name: Sub_Area_Law_Text

data.name: Error_Special_Character
data.value: Please enter a valid text which contains only alphanumeric characters, spaces & hyphen
data.comment: Validation message to ask user to enter valid characters in input text. Special characters not allowed

data.name: Error_Valid_Matter_Name
data.value: Please enter a valid Matter name which contains only alphanumeric characters and spaces
data.comment: Validation message to check if user has entered a valid matter name

data.name: Error_Mandatory_Role
data.value: Enter at least one {0} for this matter.
data.comment: Validation message to ask user to select at-least one mandatory role

data.name: Error_Select_User
data.value: Enter at least one {0} for this matter.
data.comment: Validation message to ask user to select at-least one user for the selected role
